Text: Oh... Well, I think \n you're just supposed to \n say "fetch"...

I better get her back to \n her owner. She must be \n getting worried.
That's wonderful to hear \n Zoey made a new friend.
Just make sure you throw \n it where she can get it.

I just have to throw 
 this thing and she'll go 
 get it? Sounds easy 
 enough.

How about I teach you? \n Let's play a little \n fetch with Zoey.

This little girl did.
If you do a good job, \n Zoey will run and get \n it.
You understand, right? \n You'd be sad if you lost \n something special.

But mother doesn't \n like dogs...
And throw the disc to \n some place you say.
Poor girl \n looks so sad...

That was a lot of fun!

Oh, thank you so much. 
 Me and Zoey are really 
 grateful for what you 
 did for us.

Found you!

Hm? What's that \n woman doing?
Her dog looks a \n little... down?
Zoey, I know you miss \n your toy, but come on \n dear, life goes on.
Hey, is something wrong \n with your dog?
She lost her favourite \n toy and hasn't been the \n same since.
And she can tell when I \n try to get her a new \n one.

She hasn't shown much 
 of an appetite lately, 
 so I fear she'll waste 
 away at this rate.
Poor little girl. This \n sounds like a pretty \n serious problem.
Maybe I can help find \n her old toy?
If only you could...
My servants have scoured \n Havina but haven't found \n a thing.
I'm good at finding \n stuff! Did you lose it \n around here?
Yes, I'm sure it's \n around this island.
It could be somewhere \n around the fountain \n plaza...
Maybe you can take Zoey \n with you? She might be \n able to help.
At the very least, a \n little exercise might do \n her good.
Okay! Come here Zoey.

 couldn't find it, it's 
 probably not lying 
 somewhere easy to find.

A dog toy? No, sorry.
Hmm, why was Zoey so \n excited then?

Perhaps my perfume set 
 her off. It uses only 
 the finest fresh fruit 
 extracts.

Aah! Scary doggy!

She seems a \n little nervous...

She really misses her \n toy and is soo sad \n without it.

W-Wait!

She ran over to the 
 island with the theatre, 
 so I'll bet she's still 
 there.

Me and Zoey are best \n friends. She always runs \n up to say hello.
You know, she comes from \n a very noble pedigree.

Heck, she costs more 
 than an airboat, so you 
 have to take good care 
 of her.
I-I will!
Hey there, Zoey. Good \n girl! Good girl!
You know Zoey?
I should, I've taken her \n on walks before.
Ah, I see. By the way, \n have you seen a little \n girl run this way?

Are you guys playing \n hide-and-seek?
